candidates.body:
Also fixes: #626 

Manual tested on both Windows and Ubuntu.

candidates.title: impl de trait for deserial ansi value and rgb
Update to signal-hook 0.3.8, signal-hook-mio 0.2.1
candidates.body:
Note, the documentation for creating an iterator from `&signals` suggests
it returns an infinite stream. I instead switched to `pending()`, since
presumably we don't want to block forever waiting for signals.

candidates.title: Remove lazy_static dependency
candidates.body: This replaces the `lazy_static` dependency with either atomics or `parking_lot`'s const mutexes.
